Describe the change and rationale.

## Type of change

- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug fix

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Lint/format pass locally (`ruff`, `black`)
- [ ] Type-check passes (`mypy`)

- [ ] Docs/README updated (if needed)
